education: Msc – Information Technology from Dhirubhai Ambani University (2025 - Present); BCA from Asia Paciﬁc BCA College (2022 - 2025); 12th from Ankur High School (2021 - 2022).
experience_summary: Founder & Full-Stack Developer at BiteCodes, leading a software outsourcing startup and delivering web solutions using Spring Boot, React, MySQL, and Docker. Previously a Java Developer at Concept Serve Technologies, where he developed APIs and microservices. Also worked as a Django Intern at BrainyBeam Technologies and a Healthcare Recruiter at First Connect Health.
